00019   RawValueViewProcessor a_RawValueViewProcessor_instance;
00020 
00021   RawValueViewProcessor::RawValueViewProcessor() 
00022     : VRawADCValueProcessor("RawValueViewProcessor"),
00023       _calibration(0),
00024       _display(0)
00025   {
00026     _cellParameterCollectionName="CellParameters";
00027     registerProcessorParameter( "CellParameterCollectionName" , 
00028                                 "The name of the collection which contains the pedestals, the noise, etc. of all the cells." ,
00029                                 _cellParameterCollectionName ,
00030                                 _cellParameterCollectionName);
00031 
00032     // ---- collection name of calibration constants and name of calibration object
00033     registerProcessorParameter( "Calibration" , 
00034                                 "Name of object to be used for the calibration"  ,
00035                                 _calibrationObjectName ,
00036                                 std::string("NoOpCalibration") ) ;
00037 
00038     registerOptionalParameter( "CalibrationConstants" , 
00039                                "Name of the conditions data collection which contains the calibration constants"  ,
00040                                _calibrationConstantColName ,
00041                                std::string("") );
00042 
00043   }
00044 
00045   RawValueViewProcessor::~RawValueViewProcessor() 
00046   {
00047     if (_display) {
00048       GLVIEW::GuiThread *gui=GLVIEW::GuiThread::getInstance();
00049       Display *display_ptr=static_cast<Display *>(_display);
00050       gui->removeDisplay(&display_ptr);
00051     }
00052     delete _calibration;
00053   }
00054 
00055   void RawValueViewProcessor::init( )
00056   {
00057     Display *display_ptr=0;
00058     RawValueDisplayKit display_kit;
00059     GLVIEW::GuiThread *gui=GLVIEW::GuiThread::getInstance();
00060     gui->registerDisplay(&display_ptr,&display_kit,"Value Display");
00061 
00062     VRawADCValueProcessor::init();
00063     printParameters();
00064 
00065     // --- Calibration object
00066     delete _calibration;
00067     CalibrationFactory::getInstance()->listKits();
00068     _calibration=CalibrationFactory::getInstance()->createCalibrationObject(_calibrationObjectName, _colNameModuleDescription, _calibrationConstantColName);
00069 
00070     if (!_calibration) {
00071       std::stringstream message;
00072       message << "SimpleHitSearch::init> Failed to create calibration object \"" << _calibrationObjectName << "\".";
00073       throw std::runtime_error(message.str());
00074     }
00075 
00076     gui->waitForDisplay(&display_ptr);
00077     _display=dynamic_cast<RawValueDisplay *>(display_ptr);
00078     if (!_display) {
00079       throw std::runtime_error("RawValueViewProcessor::Init> ERROR: Value Display creation failed!");
00080     }
00081 
00082   }
00083 
00084   void RawValueViewProcessor::processEvent( LCEvent * evtP )
00085   {
00086     try {
00087 
00088       LCCollection* col_adc = evtP->getCollection( _adcColName ) ;
00089       //TODO: not very efficient to copy the int vector every time. In particular, since it rarly changes.
00090       if (col_adc && col_adc->getNumberOfElements()>0) {
00091         
00092 
00093         DisplayDataPtr<RawValueDisplayData> buffer(_display, evtP->getRunNumber(), evtP->getEventNumber());
00094 
00095         if (buffer) {
00096           buffer->reset();
00097           for (UInt_t module_i = 0; module_i<_alignment.getNModules(); module_i++) {
00098             buffer->setNCells(module_i, _alignment.getNCellsPerModule(module_i));
00099           };
00100           
00101           AdcValueAccess adc_access(col_adc, &_alignment, _calibration, 0);
00102           if (adc_access.hasConnectedBlocks()) {
00103             EVENT::LCCollection *a_col=evtP->getCollection(_cellParameterCollectionName);
00104             
00105             CellParameterAccess cell_paramter_access(_cellParameterCollectionName, evtP);
00106             //  UInt_t n_values=0;
00107             do {
00108               UInt_t module_index=cell_paramter_access.getIndexOffset(adc_access.getModuleIndex());
00109               do {
00110                 //          Int_t raw_adc_value=adc_access.getAdcValue();
00111                 try {
00112                   const CellParameter cell_parameter(cell_paramter_access.getCellParameter(module_index+adc_access.getCellIndexOnModule()));
00113                   
00114                   buffer->set(adc_access.getModuleIndex(),adc_access.getCellIndexOnModule(),
00115                               adc_access.getAdcValue(),
00116                             adc_access.getCalibratedValue(cell_parameter.getPedestal()),
00117                               cell_parameter.getPedestal(),
00118                               cell_parameter.getNoise(),
00119                               cell_parameter.getNHits(),
00120                               cell_parameter.isDead());
00121                 }
00122                 catch (std::logic_error &err) {
00123                   std::cerr << adc_access.getModuleIndex() << ", " << adc_access.getCellIndexOnModule() 
00124                             << " -> " << module_index+adc_access.getCellIndexOnModule() << " / " << a_col->getNumberOfElements()
00125                             << ": " << err.what() << std::endl;
00126                 }
00127                 
00128               } while (adc_access.nextValue());
00129             } while (adc_access.nextBlock());
00130           }
00131         }
00132       }
00133 
00134     }
00135     catch (  DataNotAvailableException &err) {
00136     }
00137 
00138   }
00139 
00140   void RawValueViewProcessor::end()
00141   {
00142     // VRawADCValueProcessor::end()
00143   }
